item.description:
Live healthier, longer and stronger


Tuesday 7:00 PM FDIY Corporate, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH

My tax guy says that EVERYONE should own a home based business...here's why - http://wp.me/pNfNP-2A

Learn to live healthier, longer and stronger with 90 for LIFE!  Learn how our friends are losing 40-60 pounds and more, lowering blood sugar levels, getting off of prescription meds, reducing cholesterol, increasing energy for longer work outs and more!  Learn how you can change your focus.  Instead of pouring money into the 70 plus Billion Dollar Health and Wellness Industry, learn how you can help people and make money from it! 

Overview followed by a training. My accountant told me the other day that EVERYONE should own a home based business to get the tax benefits that are associated.

RSVP with Bernadette at 603-834-4587 or dette101@gmail.com to attend for free.
item.how_to_find_us: Middle door, upstairs in the training center

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Do you want to live healthier, longer and stronger?
